attributes.review: I don’t get why someone made a whole entire app about one person that doesn’t  even deserve an app. When I first downloaded it it said “Keep America Great.” The real question is that how are you going to make America great AGAIN when you never even made America great in the first part

attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE!!! This app made my phone glitch and kept kicking me out of the app! I think my phone may have a VIRUS now! I cannot believe our president is running this terrible app. I am so disappointed and upset, my phone is glitching terribly. Definitely deleting. Why on earth is this app still running? I am mad. This app is HORRIBLE! I DO NOT RECOMMEND IT WHATSOEVER!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP 😡

attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible, it is not worth your time and I think it deserves to be taken down, this app ruined my life, now I don’t have any friends because they saw me using this app, not only that but it’s boring and horrible, Donald Trump shouldn’t be our president if he doesn’t even know how to make a good app periodt

I can barely use it almost every time i try to open it it crashes and the time it does load in its notification after notification, i was trying to educate myself but it seems like i cant even do that. I would give it 0 stars if i could
attributes.title: Its bad, like really bad

attributes.review: This app is horrible! When I downloaded the app it asked for my race and gender, so of course I put them in (I am a white woman). Once I clicked next I got to a screen saying that since I was white I was allowed on the app, but as a woman I should wait for a man to give me directions of what to do on it! I am horribly offended! One star!
attributes.title: This app hates women

attributes.review: I love Donald J. Trump and i’m all about white power, so naturally I decided to get the official app. Trump 2020 🇺🇸!!!! However, upon opening the app Trump himself jumped out of the phone and mollywopped me upside the head. I took so much offense to that, Donald how could you do this to me🥺. If you’re going to get the app just beware that side effects may include death.
attributes.title: Mom pick me up i’m scared

attributes.review: hi my name is micheal scarn and i have to say this app is very offensive to me and that is saying something because honestly, i can be an offensive man. (but what do you expect, i mean, it’s only fitting since i supported this oompa loompa) anyways, do not download this app. do not support this chester the cheetah impersonator. i did and look where i am. i’m broke, living in a trash can outside of the london tipton hotel. if you vote for him this year, you’re signing your death certificate. the emotional toll and turmoil i experienced after downloading this app is horrendous, i almost passed out just by opening it. gross.
attributes.title: gross.
